name: Sin of Pride
description: When Kujou Sara is active and has this card equipped, all allied Electro characters with Crowfeather Cover will deal +1 additional Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG.
descriptionraw: When $[A1406] is active and has this card equipped, all allied {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> characters with <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114063]</color> will deal +1 additional <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Skill</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Burst</color> DMG.
descriptionreplaced: When Kujou Sara is active and has this card equipped, all allied {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> characters with <color=#FFFFFFFF>Crowfeather Cover</color> will deal +1 additional <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Skill</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Burst</color> DMG.
